pages.text: Cells are items that can hold exotic materials like antimatter. $(bold)$(c)Be careful with filled cells!$() They have a tendency to $(bold)$(c)explode and give deadly radiation bursts$() if left on the ground.

Filling and emptying cells is done simply by putting the filled or empty cell in the input slot of the $(l:multiblocks/vacuum_chambers/exotic_containment_chamber)exotic containment containment's$() gui.
